item.title: Build: Barnfind (in progress)
item.description: Buildlog: Barnfind (in progress) ðŸ”—Sneak peek ðŸ”—Meta ðŸ”—It’s not unusual for various barn finds to pop into existance. The term more or less signifies something rare, forgotten in time and found way later. Often a rural farmer or excentric collector. While tanks aren’t that usual, more common is it to find old cars. This diorama is a play on that theme. Here, a farmer had a German WW2 tank in his barn, forgotten in time.

item.title: Build: Clicker
item.description: Buildlog: Clicker ðŸ”—Sneak peek ðŸ”—Clicker diorama. Meta ðŸ”—The Clicker is a creature (?) in the world of The Last of Us, made by Naughty Dog. Clicker. The Clickers are originally humans, that have fallen to a fungus infection. The fungus, of the Cordyceps genus, affects, takes over, control over the body. It is famously documented on insects in the Planet Earth documentary, however the human infection is a fictious extrapolation as a plot device.
